speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the report ( A6-0254/2006 ) by Mrs Breyer, on behalf of the Committee on Women's Rights and Gender Equality, on perspectives of women in international trade ( 2006/2009(INI) ).
original: President. The next item is the report ( A6-0254/2006 ) by Mrs Breyer, on behalf of the Committee on Women's Rights and Gender Equality, on perspectives of women in international trade ( 2006/2009(INI) ).
